title: Southern Desire
description: The Point of View of Kayden KnoxWe fell in love with Kayden Knox in Irresistible Desire, Inescapable Desire, Indestructible Desire and Infinite Desire. After seeing bits and pieces through Kayden’s point of view throughout the Savannah Series readers begged for more. Y'all asked so I delivered.Southern Desire is a novella filled with some of your favorite moments in Kayden's point of view, and unseen moments never shown in the Savannah’s series four novels.Kayden is the sweet, sexy, Southern billionaire that stole Savannah’s heart in the popular Savannah series. Now see how this captivating love story unfolded through Kayden Knox’s eyes!
author: Danielle Jamie
